1489690.name: Bakery Magnate: Online
1489690.description:
Bakery Magnate is an economic game that takes place in the 90s, during the collapse of the USSR, when everyone survives as best they can. you play as Juhud, a shoemaker trying to raise his illegal business in defiance of the state and the mafia. you can develop your business in different ways, buying some businesses, trading both legal and illegal products. You can also become a supplier of goods of your own manufacture.

In the game you will find unexpected turns of events and a mysterious plot, but most importantly do not forget that the Bakery Magnate is not just a game - it's a BIG family!
Share your experience and help each other in rapid development, both morally and financially!
1489690.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 挪威语, 俄语, 土耳其语
